el_version_major.Description: Oracle Linux major version number to build.

el_version_minor.Description: Oracle Linux minor version number to build.

google_cloud_repo.Description: The Google Cloud Repo branch to use.

installer_iso.Description: The Oracle Linux installer ISO to build from.

build_date.Description: Build datestamp used to version the image.

install_disk_prefix.Description: Prefix of the disk name to install onto.

export_gcs_path.Description: A GCS path to export the image tar file to. Defaults to OUTSPATH.

image_suffix.Description: Optional suffix for the created image name (e.g. '-beta').

publish_project.Description: A project to publish the resulting image to. Defaults to PROJECT.

CreateImages.Name: oraclelinux-${el_version_major}${image_suffix}-v${build_date}
CreateImages.Description: Oracle Linux, Oracle Linux, ${el_version_major}${image_suffix}, x86_64 built on ${build_date}
